an7.10:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these seven fetters. What seven? The fetter of compliance, the fetter of aversion, the fetter of views, the fetter of doubt, the fetter of conceit, the fetter of envy, and the fetter of miserliness.[n.459] Envy(issā)and miserliness(macchariya)are listed among the ten fetters of the Abhidhamma method. See Dhs 97 (Be §8), CMA 269.These are the seven fetters."
